conbody.p: To get Device Information, use one of the following methods:

li.p: Open the Device Manager on the endpoint.

ul.li: For OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME agent, use the SLCmd.exe command on the endpoint. Refer to StellarProtect (Legacy Mode) Administrator's Guide for more details.

li.p: On , go to the Logs Agent Events on console to check the event details about removable devices with Agent Event ID 1281/1282 (OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME) or 5000/5001 (OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME).

conbody.p: For OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME agent, you can view the list of trusted USB devices on an endpoint by exporting the agent settings. To manually configure the trusted USB device list on an endpoint, do one of the following:
